title: Rasmus p√• luffen
overview: Rasmus is an orphan who lives at an orphanage with several children and his friend Gunnar. Rasmus and Gunnar is planing their escape to live their own lives. Only Rasmus succeeds. He pairs up with the hobo Oskar, who teaches him all he needs to know to survive. An odd friendship blossom between them and they survive all kinds of adventures.
